thread.section_title: Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel - UPDATED 2016 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hidden Gem
thread.title_full: Hidden Gem - Review of Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: robintA990JG
title: Hidden Gem
text:
This hotel is clean and lovely inside, and the staff is wonderful. They speak just enough English.
It's small and is located in a hutong, so it is not easy to find. But well worth it. I wish we hadn't missed the show. They had other classes for kids on the weekend as well. They offer a very nice breakfast also.
